column1: Caçapava is a municipality in the state of São Paulo in Brazil.  It is part of the Metropolitan Region of Vale do Paraíba e Litoral Norte.
Is between São José dos Campos 24 km and Taubaté 19 km.
The distance from Caçapava to São Paulo is 109 km and from Rio de Janeiro 263 km.
Caçapava has a military unit known as 12ª Brigada de Infantaria Leve
